content: manly mittens by elizabeth morrison designs for discerning knitters men s mittens with allover stranded design a man i know mentioned that he would love to own some knit wool mittens i decided to knit him a pair both mittens are worked the same and can be worn on either hand you will have extra yarn and can make a third mitten as a spare in case one gets lost these mittens are knit tightly to keep the cold wisconsin winter winds off your hands directions sizes men s m l mitten make 2 using mc co 48 51 sts distribute sts between finished measurements 9 3 10 around hand at palm
